title: Nilamani Vanki Bracelet: A Fusion of Tradition and Sparkle
materials: Minimal Inclusions). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: A modern Vanki design, featuring a prominent pear-shaped blue sapphire surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The openwork design creates a delicate yet impactful statement. Claw setting showcases the sapphire beautifully while the diamond-studded band adds a touch of contemporary elegance.
colors: Rose gold provides a warm contrast to the deep blue of the sapphire and the brilliant white of the diamonds. A classic and sophisticated color palette.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable as a special gift for anniversaries or milestone celebrations.
description: This Vanki bracelet offers a modern twist on a traditional South Indian design. The stunning blue sapphire represents wisdom and good fortune, making it not only a beautiful accessory but also a meaningful piece of jewelry. Crafted with exceptional attention to detail and high-quality materials, ensuring both lasting beauty and heirloom potential.
